IP_SYN_0_style_3:
Procedure: Therapeutic Bronchoscopy (31645).
Medical Necessity: Patient presented with RLL segmental obstruction.
Technique: Flexible bronchoscope advanced. Visualization confirmed diffuse mucous plugging causing airway obstruction. Suction was utilized to aspirate thick mucus plugs from bilateral bronchial trees, restoring airway patency. A separate bronchial wash was collected. Diagnostic inspection (31622) is bundled.
